name: 2nd International Conference on climate change
content: The International Conference on Climate Change is going to be held on 6th and 7th May 2021 in the framework of Malaysia. This conference brings together Scientists, civil communities, local professionals and other global organizations to help develop enterprising resolutions in critical areas such as global shift to renewable power; sustainable and easily scalable infrastructure and cities; sustainable agriculture and control of existing forests and oceans; resilience and adjustment to weather forces; and regulating public and private investment into renewable energy research activities.
